TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InheritanceService extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.IInheritanceService, class System.IDisposable
Public Class InheritanceService Implements IDisposable, IInheritanceService
type InheritanceService = class interface IInheritanceService interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.

Docs.summary: Adds the components inherited by the specified component to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method searches all the fields of all base classes of the specified component. Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the specified container.

Docs.param: The base type to search for.
The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
The container to add the inherited components to.
Docs.summary: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component. Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to an internal list that stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that identifies the inheritance level of the component. The component is then added to the specified container.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService.Dispose%2A> allows the resources used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> to be reallocated for other purposes. For more information about <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService.Dispose%2A>, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method. `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> references. This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

block.para:
can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

Public Function GetInheritanceAttribute (component As IComponent) As InheritanceAttribute

abstract member GetInheritanceAttribute : System.ComponentModel.IComponent -> System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute override this.GetInheritanceAttribute : System.ComponentModel.IComponent -> System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute

Docs.param: The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.
Docs.summary: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.
Docs.returns: An that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute.NotInherited>. Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.

Docs.param: The member to check. This member is either a or a .
The component instance this member is bound to.
Docs.summary: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.
Docs.returns: if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, .

block.para: By overriding this method, users can modify the set of members that the inheritance service ignores. The default implementation ignores all members that are private, and allows only public or protected members.
